channel.title: Compiling Problem - [Expected Break]
channel.description:
client.java:11373: ';' expected break ^ client.java:11378: ';' expected break ^ client.java:11383: ';' expected break ^ client.java:11388: ';' expected break ^ client.java:11393: ';' expected break ^ client.java:11398: ';' expected break ^
[b]Need help Asap I know the lines and that, i just dont understand what to do Im 6 errors away from hosting my server this has kept me back for about an hour now. Its probably simple HAHA![/b]

item.title: Compiling Problem - [Expected Break]
item.dc:creator: @EmulousGuru EmulousGuru
item.description:
@EmulousGuru wrote:

[quote=“itai, post:6, topic:363722”] if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 859)
That should be:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 859);[/quote]Wrong?

If-statements have methods following them, if you close the statement with a semi-colon, it will only give errors.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling Problem - [Expected Break]
item.dc:creator: @itai itai
item.description:
@itai wrote:

[quote=“pk 24 7, post:5, topic:363722”]This is the line 11373 error.

–> THERE [quote] if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 859)[/quote]

This is the error

[quote]client.java:11373: ‘;’ expected
break
^[/quote]

Can u explain it to me please, sorry if i dont understand
i dont really know what breaks are and such.

[/quote]

  if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 859)

That should be:

  if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 859);

Read full topic

client.java:11373: ';' expected break ^

Can u explain it to me please, sorry if i dont understand
